30b97c10-d264-48f6-a314-c84e00b43489.description: Earners of this badge have fulfilled the badge requirements for all three activity pillars (LEARN, ENGAGE, and DELIVER) within the "Lead" value of the CORE community, exemplifying an ongoing commitment to development around related behaviors including: "Cultivate Innovation", "Empower Others", "Be Accountable", and "Deliver Results".

157b2834-588f-4f69-8aa6-52e23cd5ac72.description: Earners of this badge have fulfilled the badge requirements for all three activity pillars (LEARN, ENGAGE, and DELIVER) within CORE, exemplifying an ongoing commitment to development around the behaviors associated with collaboration, including instilling trust, communicating openly, managing conflict, valuing difference, and partnering with communities.
157b2834-588f-4f69-8aa6-52e23cd5ac72.name: CORE Values - Collaborate - Complete

65f26548-6dcf-41a2-a89a-d732ac808ba3.description: Earners of this badge have gained knowledge & skills that have been identified as critical to succeed in the near future in the Energy industry, including: the capability to detect complex and changing variables and to adapt one’s management style, the understanding of Energy Transition scenario & New Energy Solutions, and attitudes & tools to foster creativity and innovation.
65f26548-6dcf-41a2-a89a-d732ac808ba3.name: ONE Academy - Emerging Skills Program

badge_template_activities.title: A selection of online courses and readings

68febd4e-24b4-44e8-ab91-ecf77d2b2d7c.description: Earners of this badge have fulfilled the badge requirements for all three activity pillars (LEARN, ENGAGE, and DELIVER) within the "Grow" value of the CORE community, exemplifying an ongoing commitment to learning and development around related behaviors including: "Learn Continually", "Be Adaptable", "Manage Ambiguity", and "Be Resilient".
68febd4e-24b4-44e8-ab91-ecf77d2b2d7c.name: CORE Values - Grow - Complete

97788194-a134-4b1d-89be-1566e9fb3e6e.description: Earners of this badge have completed all fundamental activities and requirements aligned to each of the four Baker Hughes Values as part of the CORE Community (Collaborate, Lead, Care and Grow).

0687f206-da5e-4bf3-9c67-753d2f8fa863.description: Earners of this badge have a comprehensive understanding of the energy industry, the development of energy global market and geopolitics, the underlying drivers shaping the energy transition, and the latest industrial technologies. They have demonstrated the ability to strengthen their personal leadership skills, including their communication style and negotiation, and acquired key business management tools, such as finance fundamentals and project management.
0687f206-da5e-4bf3-9c67-753d2f8fa863.name: Baker Hughes University - Junior Program

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete all courses in the Junior Program learning path across 2+ months (sessions, events, plant visits, leadership talks)
Produce and discuss a Final Project Work in teams

dca921d7-9ecc-40c2-8964-133b97d65025.description: Earners of this badge have an advanced, deep understanding of the macro-economic models and market dynamics of the energy industry by attending sessions with thought leaders and experts on topics like hydrogen or carbon capture utilization and storage (CCUS) and industrial technologies. They demonstrated ability to drive organizational changes, deal with cultural differences, engage teams, and build trust in highly competitive, volatile, uncertain, complex, and hyper-connected environments.
dca921d7-9ecc-40c2-8964-133b97d65025.name: Baker Hughes University - Senior Program

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete all courses in the Senior Program learning path (sessions, events, plant visits)

433cd687-56ea-4ce5-8e5f-6548ee963826.description: Earners of this badge participated in the 2022 Baker Hughes Empowered Hackathon. Earners participated in developing their skills and experience in SME-led workshops, then applied their learning by leveraging the Microsoft Power Platform tools to solve an identified business challenge it as a team.
433cd687-56ea-4ce5-8e5f-6548ee963826.name: EMPOWERED-Hackathon 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Must be part of a team that submitted a digital solution in the Hackathon.

c3972e85-2122-4404-be0d-3fe1b28a4137.description: Earners of this badge have fulfilled the requirements for all three activity pillars (LEARN, ENGAGE, and DELIVER) within the CORE Strengths track for Design Thinking, exemplifying an ongoing commitment to development around foundational skills including brainstorming, testing and refining, customer experience, and data intelligence.
c3972e85-2122-4404-be0d-3fe1b28a4137.name: CORE Strengths - Design Thinking

DELIVER: Submit a video, host a live event (workshop or open mic), or write an article/case study to teach back what you have learned

e4d8a380-1031-4938-9417-e7273dbf0db4.description: Earners of this badge increased the knowledge and understanding of supply chain dynamics and strategic vision needed to set the standards to drive supply chain excellence across Baker Hughes Supply Chain.

03dd103e-3268-44f0-80c9-efe7dfaf8d09.description: The Director level is for IET leaders that will take the opportunity to lead a complex Rewiring* project in their area and learn a new set of skills over a 12-month assignment. Earners of this badge successfully completed the Rewiring program and EDGE Academy learning path, demonstrating ability to transform the way we operate and shape organizational culture and business strategy. *Rewiring: cross-functional systems and processes improvement
